commands.spawnprotectiontweaks:
§6§lSpawnProtectionTweaks Version %s§r
This mod enables per dimension control of the location
and radius of the spawn protection.
An additional tweak introduced by this mod is improved feedback when players try to destroy a block covered by spawn protection.

The current default values (which you can change in the config) are: action bar %s, radius %s

Available subcommands:
  - help: Displays this message
  - reload: Reloads the config
  - enabled <set/query>: Enables / disables the mod
  - dimensions <radius/actionbar/list>: Configure per-dimension parameters
